html:
<!--
--><head>

	
	
	

	
		
		
		 | 
		
		 | 
		
		
		
		 | 
		
		404 | 
	

	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
		
	
	
	
	DESC AND KEYWORD
	
		
		
		
		
		
	
	
	

	GOOGLE PLUS
	
		
		
		
		
		
		
			
	

	FACEBOOK
	
	
	
	

	WEBMASTER
	
	
	

	OPEN GRAPH
	
	
	
	
	
	
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
			
			
			
		
		
		
		
		
			
			
			
			
			
			
			
			
			
		
		
			
			
			
		
	

	TWITTER
	
		
		
		
	
	
	
	
	
		
		
			
			
			
		
		
		
		
		
			
			
			
		
		
			
			
			
		
	

	ROBOTS
	
		
	
	
		
	
	
		
	
	
		
		/* VARIABLE
		=======================
		<Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#E4EBEE" value="#E4EBEE"/>

		<Group description="Body" selector="body">
			<Variable name="body.background.color" description="body.background.color" type="color" default="#E4EBEE" value="#E4EBEE"/>
		</Group>
		<Variable name="body.background" description="body.background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none no-repeat fixed center center" value="$(color) none no-repeat fixed center center"/>	

		<Group description="text.color" selector="body">
			<Variable name="body.text.color" description="body.text.color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000"/>
		</Group>

		<Group description="link.color" selector="body">
			<Variable name="link.color" description="link.color" type="color" default="#4285f4" value="#4285f4"/>
			<Variable name="link.color.hover" description="link.color.hover" type="color" default="#111" value="#111"/>
			<Variable name="link.color.visited" description="link.color.visited" type="color" default="#111" value="#111"/>
		</Group>

		<Group description="primary.data" selector="primary.data">
			<Variable name="primary.background" description="primary.background" type="color" default="#FFFFFF" value="#FFFFFF"/>
			<Variable name="primary.color" description="primary.color" type="color" default="#03a9f4" value="#03a9f4"/>
			<Variable name="primary.color.hover" description="primary.color.hover" type="color" default="#2196f3" value="#2196f3"/>
		</Group>
		*/

		/* Normalization */
		html,body,div,span,applet,object,iframe,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,blockquote,pre,a,abbr,acronym,address,big,cite,code,del,dfn,em,img,ins,kbd,q,s,samp,small,strike,strong,sub,sup,tt,var,b,u,i,center,dl,dt,dd,ol,ul,li,fieldset,form,label,legend,table,caption,tbody,tfoot,thead,tr,th,td,article,aside,canvas,details,embed,figure,figcaption,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,output,ruby,section,summary,time,mark,audio,video{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;font-size:100%;font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline}a img{border-width:0}img{max-width:100%;vertical-align:middle;border:0;height:auto}b,strong{font-weight:700}cite,em,i{font-style:italic}article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,section{display:block}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0}dt{font-weight:bold}dd{margin:0 0 .5em 2em}abbr,acronym{cursor:help}sup,sub{vertical-align:baseline;position:relative;top:-.4em;font-size:86%}sub{top:.4em}small{font-size:86%}mark{background-color:#ffce00;color:#182025}hr{height:1px;border:0;background-color:#ddd}input,button,select,textarea{font-size:100%;line-height:normal;vertical-align:baseline}textarea{display:block;box-sizing:border-box}

		/* blogger component */
		.widget,.section{margin:0;}
		.widget li{padding:0;}
		.widget ul{padding:0;margin:0;line-height:normal;}
		.widget-content li{list-style-type:none;}
		.separator a{margin:initial!important;}
		.separator a img{margin:1em;}
		.separator:nth-child(1) a img{margin:initial;margin-bottom:1em;}
		.Navbar{display:none;}
		/* ROOT */
		body{font-family:Trebuchet,Trebuchet MS,Arial,sans-serif;font-weight:400;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;line-height:1.625;background:$(body.background);color:$(body.text.color);}
		/* universal component */
		.hidden{visibility:hidden;height:0;overflow:hidden;display:none;}
		.clear{clear:both;}
		.shadow{-webkit-box-shadow:0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05);box-shadow:0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05);}
		.padding-0{padding:0;}
		/* heading */

		h1,h2,h3,h4,h5{display:block;font-weight:700;}
		h1{font-size:150%;}
		h2{font-size:140%;}
		h3{font-size:130%;}
		h4{font-size:120%;}
		h5{font-size:110%;}
		/* LINK */

		a:link{color:$(link.color);text-decoration:none;margin:0;-webkit-transition:ease-in-out .2s;-moz-transition:ease-in-out .2s;-ms-transition:ease-in-out .2s;-o-transition:ease-in-out .2s;transition:ease-in-out .2s;}
		a:visited{color:$(link.color.visited);}
		a:hover{color:$(link.color.hover);}
		/* content component */

		hr{border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);display:block;margin-bottom:16px;width:100%;}
		p{margin:0;margin-bottom:16px;}
		small{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.54);vertical-align:bottom;}
		figcaption{font-family:Georgia,Times,"Times New Roman",serif;}
		u{text-decoration:underline;}
		s{text-decoration:line-through;}
		sup{font-size:14px;vertical-align:super;}
		sub{font-size:14px;vertical-align:sub;}
		mark{background:#ffeb3b;}
		hr{border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);display:block;margin-bottom:16px;width:100%;}
		img{height:auto;max-width:100%;vertical-align:baseline;}
		/* pre code blockquote*/

		code,pre{font-family:Menlo,Monaco,Consolas,"Courier New",monospace;font-size:16px;color:rgba(0,0,0,.8);}
		pre{background:#efefef;margin:16px 0;white-space:pre-wrap;margin:10px 0;padding:10px 15px;border:1px solid #ddd;}
		code{line-height:inherit;word-break:break-all;word-wrap:break-word;}
		blockquote{border-left:2px solid $(primary.color.hover);font-family:Georgia,Times,"Times New Roman",serif;margin:16px 0;padding-left:16px;}
		/* table */
		table{width:100%;}
		table th{color:#4285f4;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-size:18px;}
		table td{border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);text-align:left;vertical-align:top;}
		table caption{border:none;font-style:italic;}
		th{font-weight:700;}
		td,th{padding:8px;line-height:1.42857143;vertical-align:top;text-align:left;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);}
		table.striped tr:nth-child(even) >td{background-color:#f2f2f2;}
		table.dark tr,table.dark th{background-color:#212529;color:#fff;}
		table.dark.striped tr:nth-child(even) > td,table.dark.striped tr > th{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.05);}
		table.tr-caption-container{width:auto;}
		table.tr-caption-container td{padding:8px;background:#fff!important;}
		table.tr-caption-container td a{margin:0!important;}
		/* custom component */
		a.download,a.demo{background:$(primary.color.hover);border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);border-radius:4px;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;margin:0;padding:8px 16px;text-align:center;vertical-align:middle;white-space:nowrap;text-decoration:none;}
		a.download:hover,a.download:active,a.demo:hover,a.demo:active{background:#0c7cd5;border-color:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.54);}
		/* COMMENTS */
		#comments{border:1px solid #ebebeb;background:$(primary.background);}
		.comments{clear:both;margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:0;line-height:1em;}
		.comments .title{margin:0;padding:20px 15px;position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);}
		.comments .comments-content{padding:20px 15px;padding-top:0;font-size:12px;margin-bottom:16px;font-weight:normal;text-align:left;line-height:1.4em;}
		/* COMMENT MESSAGE */
		.comments .comment-message{padding:10px 15px;line-height:1.5;margin:5px;margin-bottom:15px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;}
		/* COMMENT DISABLED */
		.comment-disable{padding:20px 15px;background:$(primary.background);margin:10px 0;font-weight:bold;}
		/* COMMENT BUTTON */
		.comment-button{background:$(primary.color.hover);border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.12);border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;margin:10px;padding:8px 16px;text-align:center;vertical-align:middle;white-space:nowrap;}
		.comment-button a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none;}
		/* COMMENT CONTENT THREAD */
		.comments .comments-content .comment-thread ol{list-style-type:none;padding:0;}
		.comments .comments-content .inline-thread{padding:.5em 1em 0 1em;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment-thread:empty{display:none;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment:first-child{padding-top:16px;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-top:1em;margin-left:40px;font-size:12px;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment{padding-bottom:8px;margin-bottom:0;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment:last-child{border-bottom:0;padding-bottom:0;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment-body{position:relative;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment-content{font-size:12.5px;line-height:19px;}
		.comments .comments-content .comment-content{font-size:12.5px;line-height:19px;text-align:none;margin:15px 0 15px;}
		.comments .comments-content .owner-actions{position:absolute;right:0;top:0;}
		/* COMMENT CONTENT THREAD TOGGLE */
		.comments .thread-toggle{cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;}
		.comments .thread-chrome.thread-collapsed{display:none;}
		.comments .thread-toggle .thread-arrow{display:inline-block;height:6px;width:7px;overflow:visible;margin:.3em;padding-right:4px;}
		.comments .thread-expanded .thread-arrow{background:url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAc AAAAHCAYAAADEUlfTAAAAG0lEQVR42mNgwAfKy8v/48I4FeA0AacVDFQBAP9wJkE/KhUMAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent;}
		.comments .thread-collapsed .thread-arrow{background:url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAA AcAAAAHCAYAAADEUlfTAAAAJUlEQVR42mNgAILy8vL/DLgASBKnApgkVgXIkhgKiNKJ005s4gDLbCZBiSxfygAAAAB JRU5ErkJggg==") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent;}
		/* COMMENT CONTENT HEADER */
		.comments .avatar-image-container{float:left;overflow:hidden;}
		.comments .avatar-image-container img{width:36px;}
		.comments .comments-content .user{font-style:normal;font-weight:bold;}
		.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author{width:18px;height:18px;display:inline-block;margin:0 0 -4px 6px;}
		.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author:before{content:'Author';position:relative;padding:2px 5px;background:#03a9f4;color:#fff;border-radius:5px;}
		.comments .comments-content .datetime{margin-left:6px;font-size:11px;float:right;}
		/* COMMENT CONTENT BODY */
		.comments .comment-block{margin-left:48px;position:relative;padding:15px 20px 15px 20px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);overflow:hidden;border-image:initial;}
		/* COMMENT CONTENT BUTTON */
		#comments ol ol .continue,/* .continou is thread reply */
		.comments .comments-content .loadmore.loaded{display:none;}
		.comments .continue a,.comments .comment .comment-actions a,.comments .comments-content .loadmore a{display:inline;font-size:12px;padding:2px 5px;margin-right:10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;}
		.comments .continue a:active,.comments .comment .comment-actions a:active{position:relative;top:1px;}
		.comments .continue{text-align:center;padding:10px 0;}
		.comments .continue a{padding:10px;}
		/* COMMENT FORM */
		#comment-editor{height:210px;width:100%!important;background:transparent url('data:image/gif;base64,') no-repeat 50% 30%;}
		.comments .comments-replybox{border:0;height:250px;width:100%;}
		.comments .comment-replybox-single{margin-top:5px;margin-left:48px;}
		.comments .comment-replybox-thread{margin-top:5px;}
		#comments .footer{padding:10px 15px;}
		/* RESPONSIVE */

		@media(max-width:768px){#comments .footer,#commentsHolder{padding:20px 15px!important;}}
		@media(max-width:480px){.comments .comments-content .datetime{float:none;display:block;margin:0;}.comments .comment-header{max-height:30px;overflow:hidden;}.comments .comments-content .comment{position:relative;}.comments .avatar-image-container{position:absolute;right:0;z-index:1;margin:2px;}.comments .comment-block{margin-left:0;}.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-left:15px;}}
		.wrapper{max-width:1020px;margin:0 auto;}
		@media (max-width:960px){.wrapper{max-width:840px;}}
		@media (max-width:720px){.wrapper{max-width:640px;}}
		#header-wrapper{padding:20px;background:$(primary.color);color:#fff;}
		#header-wrapper a{color:#fff;}
		#main-wrapper{overflow:hidden;padding:20px;}
		#content-wrapper{width:65%;float:left;}
		#sidebar-wrapper{width:35%;float:right;}
		#footer-wrapper{clear:both;padding:20px;background:$(primary.color);color:#fff;}
		#footer-wrapper a{color:#fff;}
		article.index .article-wrapper{padding:0 10px;margin-right:20px;margin-bottom:15px;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);background:$(primary.background);}
		article.post .article-wrapper{margin-right:20px;}
		article.post .article-title h2{font-size:18px;border:1px solid #eaeaea;padding:20px;text-align:center;background:$(primary.background);}
		.article-title h2{font-size:18px;}
		.article-information{overflow:hidden;clear:both;}
		.article-snippet{;}
		.article-image{float:right;margin-left:10px;height:100px;}
		.article-image img{width:150px;}
		article.post .post-body{border:1px solid #eaeaea;border-top:none;padding:20px;background:$(primary.background);}
		article.post .post-body ul,article.post .post-body ol{padding-left:30px;padding-bottom:10px;padding-top:10px;}
		article.post .post-body li{padding:5px;}
		.article-message{padding:10px;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);margin-right:20px;margin-bottom:10px;background:$(primary.background);}
		#b-section-sidebar .widget{overflow:hidden;}
		#b-section-sidebar .widget .title{padding:10px;border:1px solid #ddd;background:$(primary.background);}
		#b-section-sidebar .widget-content{padding:10px;border:1px solid #ddd;border-top:none;overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:10px;background:$(primary.background);}
		@media (max-width:960px){;}@media (max-width:720px){#content-wrapper,#sidebar-wrapper{width:100%;float:none;}article.post .article-wrapper{margin-right:0;margin-bottom:20px;}#header-wrapper,#footer-wrapper{text-align:center;}}
		@media (max-width:540px){body{background:#fff;}#main-wrapper{max-width:100%;padding:10px 0;}.article-message,article.index .article-wrapper{margin-right:0;}}
		@media (max-width:360px){;}@media (max-width:240px){;}/* POPULAR POSTS */    		.PopularPosts .post-content{overflow:hidden;padding:10px;margin-bottom:5px;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);}.PopularPosts article .post-snippet{overflow:hidden;width:100%;}.PopularPosts article .post-title{font-size:16px;float:right;width:75%;}.PopularPosts article .item-thumbnail{float:left;width:20%;}.PopularPosts article .item-byline{display:none;clear:both;}@media(max-width:960px){.PopularPosts article .post-title{float:left;width:75%;}.PopularPosts article .item-thumbnail{width:25%;}.PopularPosts article .item-thumbnail img{padding:0 5px;}}
		.linkloadmore{display:block;text-align:center;}
		#linkloadmore{display:inline-block;}
		#linkloadmore a{padding:10px;background:$(primary.color);color:#fff;border-radius:5px;}
		/* SEARCH */
		.BlogSearch form{position:relative;display:block;}
		.BlogSearch .search-input{width:70%;float:left;}
		.BlogSearch .search-input input{padding:10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;width:100%;}
		.BlogSearch input.search-action{float:right;border:none;padding:11px;width:30%;background:$(primary.color);color:#fff;}
		.topnav{overflow:hidden;background-color:$(primary.color);border-top:1px solid #088ac5;padding:0 20px;}
		.topnav a{float:left;display:block;color:#f2f2f2;text-align:center;padding:14px 16px;text-decoration:none;font-size:17px;}
		.topnav a:hover{background-color:$(primary.color.hover);color:white;}
		.active{background-color:$(primary.color.hover);color:white;}
		.topnav .icon{display:none;}
		@media screen and (max-width:720px){.topnav{padding:0;}.topnav a:not(:first-child){display:none;}.topnav a.icon{float:right;display:block;}}
		@media screen and (max-width:720px){.topnav.responsive{position:relative;}.topnav.responsive .icon{position:absolute;right:0;top:0;}.topnav.responsive a{float:none;display:block;text-align:left;}}
		/* PAGE LIST */

		.PageList li{margin-left:20px;list-style-type:circle;}
		#article-post-info{margin-top:10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;background:$(primary.background);}
		#article-post-info h3{font-size:18px;text-align:left;padding:15px;margin:0;position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);}
		.post-info-wrapper{margin:0;text-align:left;padding:20px 15px;}
		/* RELATED POST */

		#related-post{margin-top:10px;border:1px solid #ebebeb;background:$(primary.background);}
		#related-post h3{font-size:18px;text-align:left;padding:15px;margin:0;position:relative;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);}
		ul#related-summary .news-title{display:block;margin:0 0 10px;overflow:hidden;padding-left:10px;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);}
		ul#related-summary{list-style:none;margin:0;text-align:left;padding:20px 15px;}
		ul#related-summary li a.related-post-img{float:right;width:10%;}
		ul#related-summary li a.related-post-img img{width:50px;}
		ul#related-summary li a.related-post-title{font-size:18px;}
		#related-summary .related-post-snippet{float:left;width:85%;overflow:hidden;display:block;}
		#related-summary .related-post-snippet{max-height:39px;}
		@media(max-width:480px){ul#related-summary li a.related-post-title{font-size:16px;}}
		@media(max-width:320px){ul#related-summary li a.related-post-title{float:left;width:90%;}ul#related-summary li a.related-post-img{float:right;width:10%;}#related-summary .related-post-snippet{display:none;}}
		.breadcrumb{padding:15px 10px!important;border-left:4px solid $(primary.color);background:$(primary.background);margin-bottom:10px!important;list-style:none;}
		.breadcrumb li{display:inline;}
		.breadcrumb li+li:before{padding:0 3px;color:black;content:"/\00a0";}
		.breadcrumb li a:hover{color:#01447e;text-decoration:underline;}
		.main-ads,.sidebar-ads,#content-ads{width:100%;text-align:center;margin:0 auto;margin-bottom:10px;display:inline-block;}
		#content-ads{margin:15px 0;}
		.content-ads{display:inline-block;border:1px solid #ddd;padding:20px 10px 10px 10px;text-align:center;position:relative;}
		.content-ads-title{position:absolute;top:-15px;background:#fff;left:0;right:0;width:120px;margin:0 auto;}
		.main-ads img,#content-ads img,.sidebar-ads img{max-width:100%;max-height:100%;}
		/* PAGINATION POST */
		#article_pagination_post{display:block;padding:20px 15px;overflow:hidden;background:$(primary.background);border:1px solid #eaeaea;border-top:none;}
		#article_pagination_post .article_pagination_post_new{float:left;width:50%;text-align:left;}
		#article_pagination_post .article_pagination_post_old{float:right;width:50%;display:block;text-align:right;}
		a.blog-pager-older-link,a.blog-pager-newer-link{padding:10px;background:$(primary.color);color:#fff;border-radius:5px;}
		#article-ads-top{margin-bottom:10px;text-align:center;}
		.ads-wrapper{display:inline-block;border:1px solid #ddd;padding:20px 0;position:relative;width:100%;}
		.ads-top-title{position:absolute;top:-15px;background:#fff;left:10px;width:120px;text-align:center;}
		.ads-top-banner{width:300px;height:250px;float:left;}
		.ads-top-feed{float:left;width:290px;}
		.ads-top-feed ul,.ads-top-feed ul li{margin:0!important;padding:0!important;text-align:left;}
		.ads-top-feed ul{margin-left:30px!important;}
		@media (max-width:680px){.ads-top-banner,.ads-top-feed{float:none;margin:0 auto;width:100%;}.ads-top-feed{margin-top:10px;}}
		
	
	
	
		
			//	
			var maxrelated = 5,
			maxsnippet = 200,
			title_arr = new Array,
			link_arr = new Array,
			snippet_arr = new Array,
			images_arr = new Array,
			images_notfound = "https://placehold.it/250x200/03a9f4/fff?text=No+Images"
			no_arr = 0;

			eval((function(x){var d="";var p=0;while(p<x.length){if(x.charAt(p)!="`")d+=x.charAt(p++);else{var l=x.charCodeAt(p+3)-28;if(l>4)d+=d.substr(d.length-x.charCodeAt(p+1)*96-x.charCodeAt(p+2)+3104-l,l);else d+="`";p+=4}}return d})("function removehtmltag(string, longlength) {var identtag = ` d!content` >G` K#` d!` <#`!u+`&k+` >\"`#$!` %#)`!\"media$thumbnail`!00`'=!mages`!7,` N+.url;` A%` #\".replace(\"/s72-c/\", \"/w250-h200-c/\")`\"e$` |*` #\"_notfound;}` *#`\":*` /\"`$8!link`(d&h`%-\"h 						return entry.content.$t}
						var parse=function(data){cursor=null;var comments=[];if(data&&data.feed&&data.feed.entry){for(var i=0,entry;entry=data.feed.entry[i];i++){var comment={};var id=/blog-(\d+).post-(\d+)/.exec(entry.id.$t);comment.id=id?id[2]:null;comment.body=bodyFromEntry(entry);comment.timestamp=Date.parse(entry.published.$t)+'';if(entry.author&&entry.author.constructor===Array){var auth=entry.author[0];if(auth){comment.author={name:(auth.name?auth.name.$t:undefined),profileUrl:(auth.uri?auth.uri.$t:undefined),avatarUrl:(auth.gd$image?auth.gd$image.src:undefined)}}}
						if(entry.link){if(entry.link[2]){comment.link=comment.permalink=entry.link[2].href}
						if(entry.link[3]){var pid=/.*comments\/default\/(\d+)\?.*/.exec(entry.link[3].href);if(pid&&pid[1]){comment.parentId=pid[1]}}}
						comment.deleteclass='item-control blog-admin';if(entry.gd$extendedProperty){for(var k in entry.gd$extendedProperty){if(entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name=='blogger.itemClass'){comment.deleteclass+=' '+entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].value}else if(entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name=='blogger.displayTime'){comment.displayTime=entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].value}}}
						comments.push(comment)}}
						return comments};var paginator=function(callback){if(hasMore()){var url=config.feed+'?alt=json&v=2&orderby=published&reverse=false&max-results=50';if(cursor){url+='&published-min='+new Date(cursor).toISOString()}
